title: Permanent Eyebrow Makeup With Machine
headline: Master the techniques and tools used to provide permanent eyebrow treatments in this free online cosmetology course.
description: Here's your chance to master a new skill that can improve your beauty and makeup business. A permanent eyebrow treatment can create the desired eyebrow shape that doesn’t require the constant application of makeup. In this cosmetology course, we explore various types of eyebrows, colours and common skin tones. We provide the techniques and tools you need to offer this treatment for your clients and take your beauty business to its next level.
courseDescription:
Innovation keeps expanding the options the beauty industry offers its consumers. One such option is permanent eyebrow makeup, which can last as long as five years! Kristina Bagrova, an expert beautician with over thirteen years of experience, designed this free course to give you practical step-by-step instructions on how to perform this treatment. Lesson notes for this class can be downloaded from the ‘Resources’ section of the course and used for further study.

Because every face is different, eyebrow treatments usually begin with a consultation session where we determine exactly what shape and colour of brows the client wants. There are sensitive health issues to consider and these are included in the dossier you and the client will sign. We will also analyse levels of shades and various face shapes since soom look better with certain eyebrow shapes and one size doesn’t fit all.

Finally, our video lessons demonstrate the actual procedure so you can see the step-by-step process required to create professional results. When pre-drawing the eyebrow shape, note the natural direction of hair growth as this will decide the direction of your strokes. We emphasise hygiene to prevent any kind of infection. You will learn about the aftercare routines necessary to ensure the eyebrows heal and retain as much colour as possible. This safe procedure is becoming very popular now learning it will improve the services you offer. Sign up to add this exciting new makeup technique to your beauty portfolio!

certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital : a downloadable in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • : a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked , posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed : a physical version of your officially branded and security marked in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.

All are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison , please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison , you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard.
